title: One Piece Diaries #56: Little East Blue Arc
author: COMICON
description: A critical review of the Little East Blue Arc (episodes 426-429) that examines the arc's promotional purpose for Strong World, its cultural themes, and its interruption of the Impel Down storyline. The reviewer notes disappointment that the arc didn't explore East Blue diaspora culture as hoped and criticizes the villains as 'weird kinda-racist caricatures of Mexicans.'

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Little East Blue Arc

title: Episode 429 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 429 including plot summary, character appearances, debuts, production credits, trivia, and episode statistics. Contains detailed information about the episode's 10.4% TV rating and its role as the finale of the Little East Blue Arc.

title: Little East Blue Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed wiki page covering the entire Little East Blue Arc, including its connection to One Piece Film: Strong World, character information for Largo, Boss, Yoko, and the Amigo Pirates, and analysis of the arc's themes and reception.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Complete arc information and plot details

title: Largo - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Largo, the main antagonist of the Little East Blue Arc. Includes detailed information about his Ami Ami no Mi Devil Fruit powers, his relationship with brother Corto, his personality traits, and his role in attempting to capture Boss for Shiki.

title: Boss - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character/creature page for Boss, the giant modified beetle from Little East Blue. Covers his creation by Dr. Indigo, his relationship with Yoko, his molting abilities, fire-breathing powers, and his role as protector of Little East Blue.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full character/creature information including origin revelation

title: Ami Ami no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Devil Fruit page for the anime-only Ami Ami no Mi (Net-Net Fruit), detailing its Paramecia-type powers to create and manipulate nets, material absorption capabilities, and body transformation abilities demonstrated by Largo.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Complete Devil Fruit abilities and techniques

title: One Piece Episode 429 - Crunchyroll
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming page for Episode 429 on Crunchyroll, providing legal access to watch the episode with subtitles. Part of the Summit War (385-516) collection.

title: One Piece #429 - A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! Luffy vs. Largo - The Battle is on!
author: Comic Vine
description: Episode database entry on Comic Vine providing basic episode information, air date, and community ratings for Episode 429.

title: Kaze wo Sagashite - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Opening theme page for 'Kaze wo Sagashite' by Mari Yaguchi with Straw Hat, which serves as the opening for episodes 426-458 including Episode 429. Notes that initial broadcasts didn't credit the singer, which was corrected in the DVD release.
